name: Ninja Run Impossible Track
description:
Ninja swords VS pixel zombie is an entertaining ninja fighting game with stunning environment available on App Store. Choose your favorite ninja assassin and start fighting with lots of crazy zombies and wildlymonsters in the ninja swords pixel zombie killing game. In this zombie killing game, defend yourself killing incoming zombie assault with samurai sword and become a ninja assassin warrior, a tense. Ninja fighting games 3D 2017 has interesting endless gameplay to kill as many as zombies & get lot of coins in your way. Use ninja sword wisely in these ninja assassin games to kill all the zombies in single kill shot. It is an action fight game, where ninja needs to cut hundreds of zombies in the way. Display your ninja fighter skills in fight evil dead zone to kill the target while playing ninja shadow fighting games.Be a ninja legend it’s your duty to make zombie hunt and clear your way in the zombie frontier games.

Ninja swords VS pixel zombie is one of the most addictivezombie apocalypse games and best ever made on the App Store. You have played many ninja kidz adventure and little ninja games free with deadly environment. But this zombie apocalypse game is perfect for you to get experience of zombie VS ninjas. There are many challenges in the ninja fight game for the pro samurai fighters. If you are new and want to get experience of ninja battle games than must play this assassin shadow fight.Be careful when cutting the attacking zombie withsamurai swords. If you like ninja war games you will get much fun and thrill through this survival simulator game 2017. Play this amazing dead target zombie game with fighting fantasy and action fight adventure. Enjoy this ancient adventure ninja warrior game to get fun and entertainment.

Ninja swords VS pixel zombie 2017 game has realistic environment and stunning 3D HD graphics. Ninja runninggames have endless fighting adventurewith different types of zombies and monsters. There are multiple ninjas and samurai in the ninja assassin warrior games to fight and fulfill your action fighting fever.Download and install this fun fighting game, select your favorite ninjasand start fighting. Avoid hurdles and obstacles, also avoid the zombies. Run fast and tap on the right corner of the screen to jump over hurdle. Tap left corner of the screen to fight with sword and hunt down the zombies in your way. Collect a lot of coins to upgrade or buy new samurai or ninjas.It’s free to download from the App store!! Just tap to install and enjoy.
How to play:
• Tap to select your favorite ninja.
• Tap select to start playing.
• Object moves automatically.
• Tap rightcorner to make flips, jumps and stunts.
• Tap left corner to fight and kill the zombies.
• Collect the coins.
• Avoid hurdles, obstacles and zombies attack.
• Enjoy this endless fighting game.

Key Features of Ninja Swords VS Pixel Zombie:
• Exhilarating environment with breathtaking visuals.
• Thrilling experience of ninja assassin zombies war game.
• A crowd of monster zombies.
• Intuitive controls.
• Thrilling warfare gameplay with full of action.
• HD graphics of zombie town and highly rigged ninja warrior.
• High quality sound effects of zombies and ninja sword attacks.

If you like this ninja swords VS pixel zombie game, please try other games by clicking “More from Developer” or by visiting our publisher account. And don’t forget to rate and review.
